short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download pinkbike photos in highest resolution available (original size)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows you to easily download images from Pinkbike in their highest available quality and original size.

What problem does it solve? When downloading images from Pinkbike, non-owners are often limited to lower-resolution versions, which may not be suitable for certain use cases like printing, editing, or detailed viewing. For example, you might only be able to download an image at 1600x1067 resolution, whereas the original image size is much larger, like 5511x3674. This extension solves that limitation, enabling you to access and download the full-resolution, original images with a single click.

Why is this useful? Whether youâ€™re a designer, photographer, or enthusiast, having access to the highest quality images ensures you can work with the best possible version, without compromising on detail or clarity.
